criteria.criterion: Shows pipeline health summary with pass/fail/in-progress counts and overall success-rate donut visualization
criteria.evidence: `PageContent.tsx` renders health KPI cards from `healthMetrics` and an SVG success-rate donut bound to `successRate`.
criteria.actionableFeedback: Optional: add period-over-period trend deltas on each KPI card.

criteria.criterion: Includes recent pipeline runs timeline with duration bars, status indicators, and commit message context
criteria.evidence: `PageContent.tsx` timeline list maps `recentRuns` into status pills, proportional duration bars, and commit message rows.
criteria.actionableFeedback: Optional: add click-through affordance to open a run details blade.

criteria.criterion: Provides a Slowest Stages panel ranking longest-running pipeline stages with average durations
criteria.evidence: `PageContent.tsx` renders a stage table from `slowestStages` with avg duration and visual duration bars.
criteria.actionableFeedback: Optional: add sorting toggles for Avg vs P95 duration.

criteria.criterion: Displays build agent pool utilization with online/offline/busy counts and utilization context
criteria.evidence: `PageContent.tsx` maps `agentPools` to online/busy/offline summaries and utilization progress bars with ARIA values.
criteria.actionableFeedback: Optional: surface queued jobs per pool to complement utilization.

criteria.criterion: Surfaces an alert banner for pipelines failing continuously for over 24 hours
criteria.evidence: `LongFailureAlert` in `PageContent.tsx` uses `CuiMessageBar intent="warning" shape="square"` with 24h+ failing pipeline details from `longFailingPipelines`.
criteria.actionableFeedback: Optional: add deep links to each failing pipeline in the alert payload.

criteria.criterion: Includes Copilot suggestion prompts for failure diagnosis and flaky test investigation
criteria.evidence: `index.tsx` passes required prompts via `copilotSuggestions` prop on shared `PageHeader`, including both requested suggestion strings.
criteria.actionableFeedback: Optional: wire each suggestion to a contextual filter/query action.
